inout_port_usable_characters.description: Inport and Outport block names shall only use single-byte alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9) and single-byte underscore (_). Line breaks, single-byte spaces, double-byte characters, and control characters are prohibited.

inout_port_no_numbers_at_start.description: Inport and Outport block names shall not begin with a number.

inout_port_no_underscore_at_start.description: Inport and Outport block names shall not begin with an underscore.

inout_port_no_underscore_at_end.description: Inport and Outport block names shall not end with an underscore.

inout_port_no_consecutive_underscores.description: Inport and Outport block names shall not contain consecutive underscores.

inout_port_not_reserved_matlab_word.description: Inport and Outport block names shall not consist solely of a single reserved MATLAB keyword.

inout_port_max_name_length.description: Inport and Outport block name length shall be a maximum of 63 characters.
